skill.name: behaviors.skills.primitives.Evacuate
skill.description: To evacuate population located into given several populated areas.

parameter.name: populatedAreas
parameter.description: An ordered list of populated areas from which population can be evacuated.

link.name: reach
link.description: To move to the populated area to evacuate

link.name: evacuate
link.description: To activate the evacuation of the population.

feedback.name: evacuated
feedback.description: Sent when a population into a populated area is evacuated.

argument.name: populatedArea
argument.description: The populated area from which the populated is evacuated.

feedback.name: done
feedback.description: Sent when all 'populatedAreas' have been visited.

feedback.name: failed
feedback.description: Sent if the set of 'populatedAreas' is empty (no element to act on).
